about_the_game:
After days of being held captive, you finally manage to escape from your kidnapper and find help. However, the feeling of freedom you should feel evaporates when you realize you have the cell phone of the man who kidnapped you. The right thing to do would be to just wait for the police, but a strange feeling takes over you. There are dark secrets hidden in this cell phone, and YOU NEED TO UNCOVER THESE SECRETS!

A paranormal story is an investigation and suspense game where you must try to understand the past and secrets of the cell phone owner, through old messages, notes and mysterious apps through a fake smartphone interface. To do that you must explore the darkest layers that can be found on the cell phone of an unknown man — the man who kidnapped and tortured you for days.

Think twice before anything

During the game, you will have to solve countless puzzles. With each solved puzzle, a new door opens, and you get closer and closer to the truth. But be careful: in A Paranormal Story, you must choose the path that your character will follow, and each decision can influence the final outcome of your story. Containing two different endings, the game seeks to create an immersive narrative, allowing the player to explore a world full of mysteries to be unraveled.

Grab your notebook and start investigating

You will come across several symbols throughout your journey. These symbols have important meanings, and you will need to write them down if you want to solve them. However, if you choose not to decipher them, you will still be able to finish the game, but you will have less knowledge about certain aspects of the game, which may negatively affect your choices.

Features

  • Explore a dark and fascinating world, seen through both a mobile interface and an unique hand-drawn animation.

  • Enjoy an engaging gameplay experience focused on solving puzzles to unlock phone access, decipher the meaning of symbols, connecting story points, and making impactful choices that lead to different endings.

  • A short narrative designed to keep the player immersed in the game’s universe even after its conclusion.

content_descriptors.notes: Extreme violence, blood and mutilation in hand-drawn characters.
